name: Authentication Master - MFA
description: User identifier first, password as the second step, and MFA as the third step.

sktemplate.name: Fido screen authentication - meirav

customHTML.value:
<!-- Check whether the end-user browser is supporting WebAuthn to understand if security keys and platform biomentic method are usable -->
<form id="webAuthenSupportForm" method="post">
    <input type="hidden" name="webAuthenSupport" id="webAuthenSupport">
    <button type="hidden" data-skcomponent="skbutton" data-skbuttontype="form-submit" class="hidden-button"  data-skbuttonvalue="submit" data-skform="webAuthenSupportForm" id="autoSubmit">Next</button>
</form>

sktemplate.name: Browser computability check - meirav
sktemplate.template:
<form id="webAuthenSupportForm" method="post">
    <input type="hidden" name="webAuthenSupport" id="webAuthenSupport">
    <button type="hidden" data-skcomponent="skbutton" data-skbuttontype="form-submit" class="hidden-button"  data-skbuttonvalue="submit" data-skform="webAuthenSupportForm" id="autoSubmit">Next</button>
</form>

annotation.value: MFA Authentication using OTP occurs here
Pre-requisite:  This flow requires the "PingOne - Device Registration Subflow"

sktemplate.name: OTP screen - meirav

rules.wrongLength: OTP must match a six digits value

rules.message: OTP must match a six digits value

customHTML.value:
{{#ifEquals type "SMS"}} Text Message {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}} Voice {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "EMAIL"}} Email {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "TOTP"}} Authenticator App {{/ifEquals}}

{{#ifEquals type "SMS"}} Enter the passcode you received to complete text message authentication. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}} Enter the passcode you received to complete voice message authentication. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "EMAIL"}} Enter the passcode you received to complete email authentication. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "TOTP"}} Enter the passcode you received to complete authentication. {{/ifEquals}}
{{#ifEquals type "SMS"}} Message sent to:
phone {{phone}} {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}} Message sent to:
phone {{phone}} {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "EMAIL"}} Email sent to:
email {{email}} {{/ifEquals}}
{{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}}
Resend passcode
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "SMS"}}
Resend passcode
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "EMAIL"}}
Resend passcode
{{/ifEquals}}
{{#ifEquals singleDevice "false"}}
Cancel
{{/ifEquals}}
